variable.name: Age at Biopsy
variable.description: Participant's age at time of biopsy used for current study [Unknown, Not reported]

variable.name: Melanoma Primary Diagnosed
variable.description: Indicates whether patient was diagnosed for a primary melanoma prior to recurrence or metastasis [Yes, No, Unknown]

variable.name: Localization of Primary Melanoma
variable.description: Body site of patient's primary melanoma [Skin, Acral, Occult, Mucosa, Other]

variable.name: Sub-localization of Primary Melanoma
variable.description: Body site, detailed, of patient's primary melanoma

variable.name: Tumor Stage at Time of Primary
variable.description: Indicates extent or severity of patient's disease at the time of diagnosis of their primary melanoma

variable.name: Breslow's Depth of Primary Melanoma
variable.description: Description of how deeply the primary melanoma invaded skin tissue by time of diagnosis, suggestive of prognosis

variable.name: AJCC Cancer Stage: Primary
variable.description: Cancer stage of patient's primary melanoma as defined by the American Joint Committee on Cancer staging system

variable.name: AJCC Cancer Stage: Regional Nodes at Time of Primary
variable.description: Cancer stage of patient lymph nodes as the time of primary melanoma as defined by the American Joint Committee on Cancer staging system

variable.name: Systemic Therapy
variable.description: Indicates whether patient received systemic therapy for their cancer, pre and post biopsy are indicated when known
variable.comment: (b) Represents biopsy in the string, so as to indicate pre and post tumor sample treatments when known
